data.title: Love their pizza
data.text: Great pizza every time.  May have to ask for ranch and cheese and pepper packets.  Hard to go wrong with most of the different pizza styles they have.

data.title: Quick service but HORRIBLE FLAT PIZZA! ugh
data.text: Wow, I usually like Round table, I've been to more than a few. However this one was just built not too long ago and I thought GREAT, Im gonna head on over.. I did and woah.. flat pizza.. no taste and even the specialty one I like was nasty. i thought maybe it was just that one visit so I went again on another day months after and it was the same. certainly not worth the 40$ I paid. Mc Donalds would've been better and that is saying alot!!

data.title: A very convient pizza place in downtown Downey 9CA).
data.text: This is yet another restaurant in the Downey (CA) Gateway located at the Southwest corner of Firestone Blvd. & Downey Ave. directly across from Porto's (Cuban) Bakery Downey. I took my 15 year old grandson there recently, and we enjoyed fairly decent pizza. There wasn't a big crowd so all you haveto do is wait for thecookingtime of the pizza. Would I return? To be honest I tried the place before with my wife who didn't think Round Table had the best pizza. With that reservation, if your in downtown Downey, this might be the most convenient but not as great as some others not too far from downtown!

data.title: forget the mojos,,,
data.text: great thin pizzas.. great chicken. gives shakeys a run for the money... good ice cold beer, several tv's  play area for kids.... good place
